name: Purple Defender
description:
Purple Defender

Is a top-down casual sandbox shooter made in a morning, I wanted to explore Unity particle system and Post-processing to give more flavour to my game, I think it came up pretty well, I believe that the game needs a bit of fine tunning to make sure that it gets more challenging with time, and that transitions are smoother.

This game was made by 0 help of google, as I wanted to force myself to trouble solve  common issues, I think it came out great :)

Thanks for playing if you do, leave comments below so I can get better.
